translations: adj.相称的；同量的；同样大小的

sentences.sentence: Salary will be commensurate with experience.
Employees are paid salaries commensurate with those of teachers.
sentences.translation: 发给雇员的薪水与发给教师的薪水相当。

sentences.sentence: The effusiveness and time spent in giving praise should be commensurate with the difficulty and time-intensiveness of the task.
sentences.translation: 表扬用的时间和言语应该和该任务的困难程度和时间强度一致。
